title: Social Capital Building Strategies for Online Learning Delivery: Case Study-Based Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course to simultaneously enhance mathematical problem-solving skills and online collaboration competencies for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain structural and cognitive strategies for building social capital in online learning environments.

Learners can evaluate how an organization’s learning architecture (organizational structure, interaction mechanisms, technological tools) impacts the transition to online environments through case analysis.
Learners can design and propose online learning operations to strengthen social capital through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
